comment: My advisor for my first semester of clinical was Dr. Besson. She is an incredible advisor , very caring and forgiving. She is also very dedicated to her craft and wants you to be the best version of yourself. I admire her work ethic and thank her for her constructive criticism it is so helpful when doing lesson plans. I hope I have her next year!

I LOVE Dr. B! I don't think I would be where I am without her. She gives so much great advice on getting a job, which masters program to take, and so much more! I definitely will be keeping in touch with her after I graduate!

Great supervisor, love her, provides great feedback on lesson and I love that she reviews our lessons with us before we teach them and immediately after. Dr. B is very supportive and her job is to help us grow and make sure we have a job before we graduate.

ABSOLUTELY ADORE DR.B!!!! She never once made me feel like I was failing as a student teacher. Instead she was very encouraging and provide lots of real life insight. I am hoping to have her again for my YCE II experience!!

During meetings, Dr.B offered appropriate feedback and suggestions that would help make my lesson be successful and engaging for the students. When meeting with her I never felt embarrassed or ashamed that I did not know something as she made it very clear that I was still learning and that she was there to help me. Dr.B is such a sweet soul!

Dr. B has been an amazing supervisor for my student-teaching. She provides constructive feedback and is always there if you need help. She's also very caring to her student-teachers and wants you to succeed. She gives great advice not only on lessons and teaching, but also on how to get a job. She's one of the best support systems I've ever had!

Dr. B is easily one of the most impactful & inspirational advisors at KSU!! I truly feel she is the absolute best. She goes above & beyond to prepare us for our future in education. She is respectful, kind, caring, understanding, punctual, & gives detailed & explicit feedback. She gave me the space & grace to truly blossom into a confident teacher.

THE BEST supervisor! Dr. B is extremely kind, knowledgeable, admirable, and inspirational. She truly cares and provides great feedback, advice, and constructive criticism. She really wants you to be the best teacher you can be. She is always available and is willing to assist in any way possible.

I absolutely LOVE Dr. B! She is a huge reason why my student teaching experience was not as stressful! Dr. B truly cares for all of her students as if they were her own. She provides specific and encouraging feedback, ensures you are putting your absolute best in every assignment, is extremely flexible, and is accessible outside of the classroom.

Dr. B is the absolute BEST professor at Kennesaw. She is so caring and understanding. She taught me to extend grace to myself and everyone else. Working with her, you will definitely see why she won Forsyth County Teacher of the Year in 2008. She doesn't just tell you what to do, but she shows you. Also, she helped me secure my dream school!!

Dr. B was the best supervisor ever!! She helped me land a job in the grade I wanted through all her contacts (: She has given us such amazing advice and guidance. I have so much that I learned from her that I can't wait to use next year in my own classroom. I'm going to miss her so much next year!!!!
